package.name: naive_read_encoder
package.description:
read_encoder tutorial, is based on the push button tutorial, but reads a incremental rotary encoder based on signals A, B and full rotation signal this project is a bad example on how to read an encoder, since it skips ticks. Please use it to learn about it but refer to the tutorial read_one_encoder to achieve good results.
As you will see, read_one_encoder uses interruptions to catch all ticks comming from the encoder.
